Functions

Function(s) admin.is_table_constraint.
return true when p_constraint is a constraint on the table p_schema. p_table example: select admin.is_table_constraint('oms','User2OrganizationDO','User2OrganizationDO_fk_organization');

FUNCTION admin.is_table_constraint ( p_shema character varying, p_table character varying, p_constraint character varying ) RETURNS boolean LANGUAGE 'sql' stable;
